pdp-desc: The description of the extension as shown in Special:Version.
pdp-special-title: Title of the Permissions special page.
pdp-permissions-matrix-submit-text: Label shown on the submit button when editing permissions via the permissions matrix.
action-pdp-manage: The 'active' description of the `pdp-manage` right, used in a sentence like 'You do not have permission to ...'.
